section.p: ‘Nerech’s a dangerous place - even its coastal waters, Cap’n,’ says the first mate. The crew won’t follow you there if they don’t think you’re good enough to lead them!’

p.if: If your Rank is 4 or more, turn to paragraph 50 in The Plains of Howling Darkness.

section.p: If your Rank is less than 4, the first mate advises you against making the ocean journey. If you take his advice, .
If you insist on making the trip, you need to to convince the crew to follow you.
